messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]Education laws/Amish
messages.msgSnippet: More often these days, Amish (and many Mennonites) do hold jobs outside their own communities. With the ever-rising price of good farm land, some families just
messages.messageBody:
More often these days, Amish (and many Mennonites) do hold jobs outside their own communities. With the ever-rising price of good farm land, some families just can't give a farm to each son.
>But usually just by selling the things they make/grow >on their own land. They don't hold jobs outside their >community.
>Myranda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]Education laws/Amish was Re: Who should pay?
messages.msgSnippet: But usually just by selling the things they make/grow on their own land. They don t hold jobs outside their community. Myranda Now I don t know about the
messages.messageBody:
But usually just by selling the things they make/grow on their own land. They don't hold jobs outside their community.
Myranda

Now I don't know about the Mennonites, but I do know that the American
Indians and the Amish make money outside their community.
~Nancy not picking on the Amish, just very curious! <g>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]Education laws/Amish was Re: Who should pay?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/8/02 8:30:32 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Now I don t know about the Mennonites, but I do know that the American Indians and the Amish
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/8/02 8:30:32 AM Central Daylight Time,
myrandab@... writes:


> Right! I don't know hot Pennsylvania excuses them from the laws, but in
> Tennessee the Menonites are excused much the same way that Indian
> Reservations are, only to a much larger degree. It does have something to
> do with them being a religious community, but even more, they are a
> self-contained community - they have owned their land for decades or
> longer, they do not make money outside their community

Now I don't know about the Mennonites, but I do know that the American
Indians and the Amish make money outside their community.
~Nancy not picking on the Amish, just very curious! <g>
